other_tests.findings: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is a 1.1 cm simple cyst in the right lobe of liver. The main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites. No intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CHD measures 6 mm. Distended gallbladder containing stones with pericholecystic fluid. Mild gallbladder wall thickening is present.
